Industrial Grade Drawer Slides

Apr 3, 2015 • admin

As an industrialist, you are looking for the industrial grade heavy-duty products that help keep the load stay secure, then visit at Ovis. They carry a lot of different products for industrial purpose like 48″ Drawer slides, 60″ drawer slides, discontinued items, and relative hardware, Senco fasteners and much more at an affordable price. You can shop by your choice of drawer slide sizes for your demanding and mobile applications that help keep your loads safely.
